IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Goodwill Mennonite Home provides a continuum of care offering Independent Living, Assisted Living and Long-term care services. Goodwill also provides specialty services such as special therapy, hospice
IRS990.MissionDesc: Goodwill Mennonite Home provides a continuum of care offering Independent Living, Assisted Living and Long-term care services. Goodwill also provides specialty services such as special therapy, hospice
IRS990.Desc: Nursing Home - Goodwill is a 108 bed skilled nursing home which is Medicaid and Medicare certified. We provide high-level quality care using innovative technology in skilled nursing, Alzheimer's care and progressive physical, occupational, and speech therapy. Other services include IV therapy, Peritoneal Dialysis, Social Services, beauty/barber services, care plan meetings, Hospice services and in-room physician visits.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: Assisted Living at Goodwill is licensed for 3 levels of care and currently consists of 37 studio apartments. Residents receive 24 hour personal care assistance, medication management and administration, housekeeping, laundry, meals, planned activities and the scheduling of medical appointments.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: Independent Living at Goodwill is a retirement village that offers opportunity for active lifestyle without the responsibilities of home maintenance. The village consists of 30 cottages. One and two bedroom designs are available. Each of these modern residence features a private connected garage, handicap accessible features and fully furnished appliances and utilities. The contracts offer use of the nursing home if the resident becomes incapacitated.

OtherLiabilitiesOrgGrp.Desc: DEPOSITS ON ACCOUNT DUE TO RESIDENTS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Dr. Miller is paid as a subcontractor for treating patients in the nursing home. He is paid 80% of the Medicare B fees collected.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS ARE VARIOUS MEMBERS OF LOCAL MENNONITE CHURCHES.
WHO ARE VOTED ON BY ALL MEMBERS.
AN ANNUAL MEETING IS HELD FOR ALL MEMBERS TO ATTEND AND TO VOTE ON BUSINESS OF THE ORGANIZATION THAT IS REQUIRED BY THE BY-LAWS.
KEY EMPLOYEES AND BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE TO BOARD ANY SUCH SITUATIONS WHICH ARE REVIEWED BY FULL BOARD.
SALARIES ARE BASED ON DUTIES AND COMPARATIVE SALARIES IN THE INDUSTRY.
SALARIES ARE BASED ON DUTIES AND COMPARATIVE SALARIES IN THE INDUSTRY ADJUSTED ANNUALLY FOR COLA.
